title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta until crisp. Beat eggs with cheese. Combine all with drained spaghetti off heat and season.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill until cooked. Make sauce with onion and tomato puree, then add cream and chicken. Simmer and serve hot.
